name: hitTest(_:withDestinationRect:context:hints:flipped:)
desc: Returns whether the destination rectangle would intersect a non-transparent portion of the image.
declaration:

withDestinationRect imageRectDestSpace: NSRect, 
     context: NSGraphicsContext?, 
       hints: [NSImageRep.HintKey : Any]?, 
     flipped: Bool) -> Bool
